name: Orbit
description: Make an object move along an ellipse around a position.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Set speed
actions.description: Set the speed the object orbits at.
actions.display_text: Set {my} speed to {0} degrees per second

params.name: Speed
params.description: The new orbit speed, in degrees per second.

actions.name: Set target
actions.description: Target a position in the layout to orbit around.

params.name: X
params.description: X position of target in layout co-ordinates.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y position of target in layout co-ordinates.

actions.name: Set rotation
actions.description: Set the current orbit position by its angle.

params.name: Angle
params.description: New orbit rotation angle, in degrees.

actions.name: Set offset angle
actions.description: Set offset of ellipse angle from axis.

params.name: Angle
params.description: New offset of ellipse angle from axis, in degrees.

actions.name: Set radius
actions.description: Set the primary and secondary orbit radii.

params.name: Primary radius
params.description: New primary radius length, in pixels.

params.name: Secondary radius
params.description: New secondary radius length, in pixels. (For a circle make the same as primary)

params.name: State
params.description: Whether to match the rotation of the object to the orbit angle.

actions.name: Pin
actions.description: Set an object as the target location to orbit around.

actions.name: Set acceleration
actions.description: Set the rate the object's orbital rotation changes.
actions.display_text: Set {my} acceleration to {0} degrees per second per second

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The new orbit acceleration, in degrees per second per second.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Reset total rotation
actions.description: Return the total rotation and total absolute rotation counters to 0

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The orbit speed in degrees per second.

expressions.name: Acceleration
expressions.description: The orbit acceleration in degrees per second per second.

expressions.name: PrimaryRadius
expressions.description: The length of the primary radius, in pixels.

expressions.name: SecondaryRadius
expressions.description: The length of the secondary radius, in pixels.

expressions.name: OffsetAngle
expressions.description: The ellipse offset angle, in degrees.

expressions.name: Rotation
expressions.description: The current orbit rotation, in degrees.

expressions.name: DistanceToTarget
expressions.description: The current distance to the target position.

expressions.name: TotalRotation
expressions.description: The total unclamped rotation so far, in degrees. Value decreases with CCW rotation.

expressions.name: TotalAbsoluteRotation
expressions.description: The total unclamped rotation so far, in degrees.
